sir david não poupou críticas à política ambiental do presidente george w bush que se recusa a apoiar o protocolo de kyoto tratado para reduzir as emissões de dióxido de carbono que intensificam o efeito estufa	intensificam	 causam::0.16384008526802063	 aumentam::0.033876415342092514	 reduzem::0.02471955120563507	 envolvem::0.02220313809812069	 afetam::0.018587686121463776	 podem::0.018007008358836174	 têm::0.016865501180291176	 incluem::0.015494612976908684	 é::0.013741717673838139	 influenciam::0.01357913576066494	 controlam::0.012524200603365898	 são::0.011375607922673225	 diminuem::0.011265747249126434	 compõem::0.010860645212233067	 representam::0.009933494962751865	 provocam::0.009475136175751686	 sobre::0.00794921349734068	 tem::0.007892649620771408	 irão::0.006818023510277271	 para::0.00614455109462142
quem não conseguir esgotar o armazenamento de diesel puro não pode misturar com o b2 porque o produto ficaria fora de especificação	esgotar	 fazer::0.11011610925197601	 utilizar::0.065793476998806	 manter::0.03596394136548042	 usar::0.034325409680604935	 trocar::0.03284362331032753	 substituir::0.020820684731006622	 realizar::0.01937505602836609	 obter::0.016513800248503685	 retirar::0.014646499417722225	 reduzir::0.014596523717045784	 com::0.013090630061924458	 evitar::0.011406704783439636	 comprar::0.011247695423662663	 ter::0.010744424536824226	 efetuar::0.00976382102817297	 aumentar::0.00869260635226965	 administrar::0.007962191477417946	 deixar::0.007886257953941822	 garantir::0.007559646386653185	 suportar::0.007021893747150898
com capacidade para 283 presos abriga atualmente 541 condenados quase o dobro do previsto	atualmente	 1::0.31995105743408203	 2::0.21934933960437775	 3::0.07072284072637558	 6::0.0377928800880909	 4::0.03206265717744827	 5::0.025623498484492302	 7::0.01752176694571972	 9::0.01554997731000185	 aproximadamente::0.010320653207600117	 12::0.01014639250934124	 8::0.01009697001427412	 quase::0.009789903648197651	 11::0.007659366354346275	 10::0.006223221309483051	 r::0.004951903596520424	 14::0.004898694809526205	 22::0.004360447637736797	 os::0.004340003244578838	 13::0.0041493563912808895	 17::0.004044093657284975
